short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A FPS monitor for Penguin Diner games on 2dplay.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A FPS display tool for Penguin Diner 1 and 2. 

This tool was created to show a on screen fps readout for speedrun of the penguin diner series. This tool only works for the static versions of penguin diner.
